conversations.content: Generate a haiku about the following topic: Night's depth meets the scent of pines, distant from the ocean.

profound blue of night 
the resin and salt of pines
so far from the sea
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A young woman enjoys the warmth of a late summer day by a vacant pool.

indian summer
the neighbor's daughter sunbathes
beside their empty pool
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A beautiful morning is disrupted by shadows.

Ordinary morning
bluest of skies, crisp, clear air
until the shadows
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The allure of fast food on a sunny October day.

drawn in by the smell
of fast food and vinegar
this october sun
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Rumors are like recycled stories, twisted and reused.

recycling--
old stories get a new twist
at the rumor mill
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A car makes a U-turn on an autumn afternoon.

making a u-turn
clear in the rear view mirror
autumn afternoon
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A shared, monotonous existence between goldfish and office workers.

gliding back and forth
through the office aquarium
goldfish and workers
Generate a haiku about the following topic: An old donkey patiently waits for food as the sun rises.

Patient old donkey
waiting for her morning hay
Gray August sunrise
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A girl in a white dress is likened to a summer butterfly in the morning breeze.

summer butterfly
a girl wearing a white dress
in the morning breeze
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Summer's end is marked by fireflies and crickets.

a night of fireflies
and cricket song . . .
the end of summer
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Boats return as the sky clears after a storm.

Hovering grey sky
a small crack in the thick clouds
fishing boats come in
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A cozy start to a cold October morning.

October morning
a new pair of new wool socks
on my very cold feet
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Summer's end, moon obscured.

Last night of Summer
the bright full moon of last night
hidden by a cloud
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A peaceful morning with sunshine and a blue ocean, contrasted with the everyday act of boiling water for tea.

At last some sunshine
blue Pacifc this morning
boiling tea water
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A hot summer day and a homeless person's struggle to cool down.

sultry July day
a homeless fans herself with
a piece of cardboard
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Cicadas are chirping less as summer ends.

summer's end .
their chirping slows down -
good-bye, cicadas!
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Children playing outdoors until nightfall during springtime.

Fragrant spring blossom
children play outside until
there is no more light.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Pregnancy and the anticipation of new life juxtaposed with the unexpected return of winter.

Spring snow --
an expecting mother rests
her hands on her belly
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A full moon illuminates the artificiality of beauty in a shop window.

Full moon night -
the shape of the mannequins' breasts
in the shop-window
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A one-way sign in New York points toward the smoke and debris of 9/11.

New-York September
the one-way sign points towards
the billowing cloud
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A blackbird's noisy complaint on election day.

chuntering at something
the blackbird on the fence post
- election day
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Aging, with a hint of youthful memory in the eye.

green rimmed eye -
a glimmer of youth buried
in the fading iris
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Reading a letter in dim light.

dark lamp shade--
squinting her eyes in low light
to read your letter
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A missing girl's poster is found at the beach, disturbed by the wind.

ebb tide --
a photo of a missing girl
flutters in the breeze
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A magical being secretly gifts dreaming children with socks.

he peeks through windows
for socks of dreaming children
to give them surprise

wine drinks decoctions
soups stews broths mousse and puddings
sweet sour all for you
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A lost ring is found and filled, symbolizing enduring love and a yearning for new romance.

and fills the lost ring's
hollow with life's most lasting
part cries for new love
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A question about the authorship of an arrow.

who shot the arrow
the poet-priest milman
or southey or barrow
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Sunlight and shadows play on a wall in a peaceful garden.

in the quiet garden world
gold sunlight and shadow leaves
flicker on the wall
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A still pond reflects the sky, blurring the line between reality and its reflection.

profound stillness clouds
and trees collect on the pond
which way up which down
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A peaceful, rainy morning.

rain in the morning
soft beginning of the day
inviting stillness
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A mother's weather prediction based on sunset color.

my mother told me
that a yellow sunset means
hard wind is coming
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Winter landscape offers a stark contrast, with heavy clouds and bare trees below snow-covered mountains.

clouds hang on bare trees
but the snow on the mountains
is a white blessing
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Jam warms a cold heart.

in the cold season
a jewel jam is an aid
to my freezing heart
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Seeing the ray leads to finding true love.

can you see the ray
if you can see it you will
soon find your true love
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A serene summer moment evokes feelings of peace and lightness.

like a summer breeze
blue sky landing in my heart
a cloud with feathers
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A beautiful sunrise.

the morning sunrise
so beautiful to behold
glowing breath of light
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The haiku describes the intense heat experienced at the beach during summer.

in the summer heat
like hot coals under your feet
where sun and sand meet
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Finding peace in the questioning, despite unanswered questions.

in sowing questions
for which there are no answers
she's finding her peace
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Hidden fears dissipate in the light.

deep in the darkness
fly all things that we most fear
lose them in the light
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A solitary, beautiful sound within a harmonious melody.

a blue note resting
in a line of green music
sweet and clear and high
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A pale object adorned with sunlight.

an object light skin
wearing the august sun as
a silver garland
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A summer scene of swimming that feels like flying.

dancing on water
in shimmering summer shades
we swim through the sky
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Autumn day's end, sunset's glow on a hill.

sunset on the hill
lights the end of autumn day
with glowing sunrays
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Swimming in a lake as sunlight fades through the trees.

through the tree shadows
swimming on the sparkling lake
in last light of day

swans rest together
in the evening star sunset
until darkness falls
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Love can be found even in dark times if you look for it.

darkness has a light
when we look through the shadows
for love we may seek
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A peaceful encounter with a beautiful barn owl.

white barn owl i held
heart shaped face and beautiful
looked at me with peace
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Spring's vibrant renewal of nature.

how green is my land
spring now bursting with fresh life
trees with new leaves hang
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Sunset clouds create magical light.

clouds at sunset time
hide the dying gold sun rays
shine as magic lights
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A beautiful sky connects heaven and earth.

heaven meets the earth
sky blue with white clouds sailing
jewelled with silver
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A ship's journey across the sea, viewed from a bay.

like a ship sailing
on the sea to distant lands
looking out on bay
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A landscape of light, shadow, and clouds.

light on the mountains
shadows in the green valleys
grey clouds in the sky
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A still moment reflecting the sky in water.

grey clouds in the sky
silver blue waters in pool
shadows reflecting

lake of magic tales
light of heaven shining here
with soft autumn shades
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Autumnal landscape with long shadows under a low sun, where the land meets the sea and sky.

green gold autumn hues
shadows long with sun so low
distant sea and sky
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Nature's reflection in a lake on a windy day.

restless clouds dancing
copper and jade trees sailing
mirror of the lake
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Light and shadow interplay in a forest.

dark shadows shining
shadows of gold and green shades
shadows of trees glow
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A quiet winter scene with snow covering fields under a grey sky.

stillness in the air
snow carpeting the green fields
grey light shines from sky
Generate a haiku about the following topic: An old oak tree offers protection.

the old oak tree stands
protecting and sheltering
with its outstretched arms
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Easter's celebration of resurrection and new life.

celebrate easter
resurrection from the earth
the gifts of new life
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Finding refuge in stone walls amidst a snowstorm.

snow covers the floor
no roof to protect from storms
shelter from stone walls
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A peaceful summer scene with buzzards flying above a white house.

in serene silence
where buzzards soar in the sky
the white summer house

new foal of pure gold
spirit of the high mountains
so wild and carefree
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Reaching for the sky, like clouds, with a sense of distance.

reaching to heaven
clouds of white billowing mists
so far yet so near

feathers of soft silk
colours of clouds in the sky
silence of the swans
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Sunlight breaking through clouds is likened to a divine, heavenly scene.

its called a gods sky
when sun rays escape through clouds
as if from heaven
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The haiku describes the transition from light to darkness at sunset.

when shadows begin
to eat the light at sunset
darkness will swallow
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A house, though old, stubbornly stands.

her walls still hold on
to years of being a home
refusing to fall
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A woman relaxing in a tub among roses at sunset.

she put a long tub
in the rose bed for herself
to soak at sunset
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A woman observes her neighbors.

she spends time peeping
looking out windows and doors
watching the neighbors

sunrise or sunset
the two are the same as one
both do a light show
Generate a haiku about the following topic: An old truck perseveres despite harsh weather.

the old rusted truck
still wants to run in spite of
snow ice slush and sleet
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A red caboose stands out on an old train car.

the old train car seemed
to be announcing that yes
red suits a caboose
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Moss hints at the end of winter with its green color.

moss speaks in colors
touch of green says winters time
will soon be ending
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A snowman stubbornly resists melting despite the warmer weather.

the snowman held on
getting smaller and smaller
refusing to melt
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A bird builds its nest on a grape vine fence, hidden by leaves.

she built her nest low
on a split rail fence of grapes
tucked under the leaves
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Unease lingers in a scene of an old men group and a girl burdened with chores.

it still dont seem right
seven old men with a girl
who does all the chores
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Finding joy and beauty in the simple act of walking stairs, perhaps drawn by the promise of something magical.

i would walk these stairs
just for the joy of color
and the rainbows end
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A reflection on the perspective of sea creatures observing human activity.

what must sea ones think
to see the strange lights drop down
into their dark world
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Intersection of colors, hinting at a hidden location.

a crossing of lights
a pair of bold bright colors
does x mark the spot
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Angels sing for food and wine, a joyful scene.

chubby-cheeked angels
sing for their wine and supper
glorious delight
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Graffiti as outlaw art.

mysterious marks
try to hide an outlaw kick
creating odd art
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Rust accumulating between layers of metal subtly alters perception.

tin within tin rust
makes a big difference to
the blind-staring eye
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Generational female labor of maintaining cleanliness.

always womens work
grandmother mother and me
keeping the world clean
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A red tie unifies a street scene, creating a pleasant feeling.

the red ties all of
this street-side scene together
such a nice gesture
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A dreamlike, unfinished staircase.

a mysterious
stair  scene from last nights dream  stops
before ground is reached

new mexican spring
appearing on both sides of
screen as expected
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Businesses face costs even when inactive.

the cost of doing
business means keeping buildings
through the off season

sea spray on the glass
served to turn the view into
a water color
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Blue's allure blinds, causing a loss of perception.

calming properties
of blue lured them until they
forgot how to see
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A broken wall prompts reflection on whether a mirror would mirror that brokenness.

would a mirror have
a crack to match the one thats
bisecting the wall
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A carnival ride malfunctions, prompting relief at being on solid ground.

the carnival ride
had a bit of a stutter
glad i was grounded
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A friend observes abstract art in the sky.

my friend bonnie said
this is abstract art in the
sky shes right of course
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Faded paint on doors diminishes hope.

turquoise doors and trim
seem less hopeful since fading
peeling have set it
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The speaker is encountering something unknown and creepy and wants to escape.

this thing i dont know
what it is  other than creepy
get me out of here
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The living find solace in grave site lights, while the dead are indifferent.

night lights at grave site
comfort the living the dead
may not have noticed
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A lone observer finds solace in a desolate landscape.

a desolate place
i stood on the porch to watch
the road it felt right
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A woman's eyebrow plucking is compared to an Escher drawing.

she's plucking eyebrows
from the wall mirror like an
escher drawn escher
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A lonely person/beggar in an alley seeks solace in the wind and music from coins.

what wind finds you here
begging shadows, coins tapping
songs for an alley
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A stark contrast between dead rabbits and newborn limbs evokes a sense of mortality and vulnerability.

rabbits at market,
their furs pulled off like mittens?
shiny, newborn limbs.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A young bird hesitates to leave its nest, despite needing to learn to fly.

not willing to leave
this imperfect nest, this bird
has so much to learn.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A seductive and deceptive woman.

curvaceous woman
vibrates at the edge of you
a dark, sultry lie
Generate a haiku about the following topic: An aging oil worker reflects on past regrets.

fading oil worker
bedded now, and filled with tar
counting his regrets

lazy river . . .
drifting toward the equinox
on an inner tube

a wash of daisies
along the cliff top . . .
the whales give a blow

the polished surface?
a white heron hesitates
to put its foot down
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A worker clears their throat before starting the day.

coughing and spitting
into the morning glories
then off to work again
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A heron slowly moves through colorful autumn.

a great blue heron
wading through autumn colors
one step at a time
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A noisy street scene is muted by a gloomy, overcast sky.

The chatter of the
passersby, Is dulled beneath
the grey unquiet sky.

The dogs were handsomely
provided for, But shortly afterwards
the parrot died too.

And in that Heaven
of all their wish, There shall be
no more land, say fish.

Into the night, and
on, The strength and splendour of
our purpose swings.

Where flies our flag is
Freedom's holy ground; There, it unfurls
all benisons to Man.

The old man fed his
life On the beauty of his vase,
on its perfect shape.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A fall and resulting pain.

A clod rolled down, and
his foot slipped back, And he lurched
with a cry of pain.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A quick grab of something slimy.

She darted her hand
out, and seized the thick Wriggling
slime, Only just in time.

I feel so well and
happy to-day, I think I shall
take a Holiday.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Expensive watches are being auctioned.

The Auctioneer said
one could seldom buy Such watches,
and the prices were high.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A praying monk starves himself.

As a monk who prays"
A Tale of Starvation: "And
he neither eat nor drank.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A mule, angered, runs off while a fool stubbornly returns to his task.

The mule, lashed into
a fury, ran; The fool went back
to his stone and swore.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A distant city glows golden in the sunset.

But on the far side
is a city whose windows flame
gold in the sunset.

Blue through the window
burns the twilight; Heavy, through trees,
blows the warm south wind.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Love and intimacy embraced by the night.

I felt your clinging
hands while night's broad wings Cherished
our love in darkness.
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A small, horned moon is addressed in the night sky.

Slipping softly through the
sky Little horned, happy moon, Can you
hear me up so high?

I went out and looked
towards the east, While tears fell
and wetted my clothes.

She knelt down and asked
her former husband “What do you
find your new wife like?
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The sun rising will reveal something.

In a moment the
sun will rise in the east And
then _it_ too will know.

Their long cries enter the
blue clouds; Their flapping wings
tirelessly beat and throb.

Me no magical
arts can save, Though you may hope
for a wizard’s aid.

Since the day that I
was joined to you We have shared
all our joys and pains.

His old poems are deep
in dust At the bottom of
boxes and cupboards.

Goddess of morning,
Aurora, as friend of my
muse I once knew you.

Why do dentists try
 to talk to you when they have
their hands in your mouth
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A humorous welcome to Spruce Grove, noting a strong, possibly unpleasant, odor.

Welcome to Spruce Grove
 Gene I thought I smelled something
PUNgent in the air

Persistence is to
 the character of man as
carbon is to steel

In honour of my
 birth month i expect some bomb
ass cunnilingus

why do basic clothes
 look good on others while they
look like trash on me

On Easter two words
 you can say to Jesus if
you know what i mean
Generate a haiku about the following topic: She's going through unfair hardship.

She deserves the world
 and not this bullshit that they
are putting her through
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Unwavering love is reflected in the moon.

the moon reminds me
 of him i still love him and
nothing can change that

I want an honest
 relationship No lies no
mind games no cheating

I swear bored eating
 wasn't a real thing until
I got to college
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Seeking knowledge can lead to delusion.

As Mark Zuckerberg
 would say research of knowledge
leads to delusion
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Lost in blue, lost you too.

Didn't know getting
 lost in the blue It meant I
wound up losing you
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A supportive cat stays by the speaker's side in bed.

My cat is always
 by my side when I'm in bed
He's so supportive

Who knew that picking
 a carpet colour would be
so stressful MY GOD
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Overjoyed by the return of a beloved filter on Twitter.

Twitter brought back my
 favorite filter and I
don't know how to act
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A "mama's boy" criticizes others for insincere Mother's Day displays.

Been a mamas boy
 Y'all trifling and be putting
on for mother day

I told myself that
 I wouldn't be scared but I
still having nightmares

I bear greetings as
 well as a dance of friendship
on behalf of friend
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Asking for feedback on a profile picture.

Hey you all answer
 to this question please Do you
like my profile pic
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Taking an ex back is a bad idea.

Taking your ex back
 is like trying to put poop
back into your butt

My doctor says I
 can start on T blockers next
month So yay for that

If I never sell
 a record or a song in
da trap I went gold
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The speaker contemplates the feeling of having a child.

Heh I'm wondering
 how it feels like to have a
daughter or a son
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Surprise gift of a ticket leads to an obligation.

Husband just bought me
 a ticket as a surprise
so I have to go
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A cat's unusual behavior suggests a possible health issue, not just bad temper.

Starting to think my
 cat needs a vet and isn't
being an asshole
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Enjoyed watching "Love, Simon" and expresses love for Jesus.

i watched love simon
 yesterday and it was SO
GOOD i love jesus
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Blessings and healing can come from sadness.

what if your blessings
 come through raindrops what if your
healing comes through tears
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A vast collection of books.

Books to the ceiling
 books to the sky my pile of
books is a mile high
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The author lists women, girls, and babies as hobbies.

Says here your hobbies
 are women girls and chicks And
babes don't forget babes

has absolute right
 to keep his underpants clean
too Does he do it
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Rumors are confirmed to be true.

I didn't believe
 the rumors at first but now
I can see they're true
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A person wants to go home after a panic attack.

just had the fattest
 panic attack and now I
just want to go home

Lord I'm craving a
 chicken box lord why are you
doing this to me

The new National
 Industrial Court in Port
Harcourt is nice sha
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A message is left on the side of the recipient's house, not on Facebook.

I posted on your
 wall No not Facebook look at
the side of your house
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A princess cares for the common people despite her status.

Just because i am
 a princess doesn't mean i
don't care for peasants

Y'all I almost died
 on the road and instead of
getting shook I laughed

Don't know if being
 turned into a parking lot
is less indignant
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Procrastinating on an essay for the third night.

Let me pretend to
 start on this essay for the
third night in a row
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Playing to win during the regular season.

It's the regular
 season The objective is
to play to win games
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Love sometimes involves pain.

Love isn't suppose
 to hurt but it does come with
occasional pain
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Iced coffee and snow don't mix well.

I made a mistake
 carrying my iced coffee
out into the snow
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Biological birth doesn't guarantee motherhood.

Just because you gave
 birth to a child it doesn't
make you a mother
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Respect a reader's quiet time with their book.

Thou shall not disturb
 a book lover when he she
is reading a book
Generate a haiku about the following topic: A person drinks coffee before attempting a nap.

Chugging a cup of
 coffee before I try to
lay down for a nap
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Cooking dinner while most people are elsewhere.

You can put dinner
 on to cook yet nine tenths of
the population

Im always freezing
 when I go to bed but I
still never wear pants
Generate a haiku about the following topic: Someone is about to watch the entire movie Forrest Gump.

Attempting to watch
 Forrest Gump from beginning
to end Wish me luck
Generate a haiku about the following topic: The speaker was delayed because they were savoring a delicious honeydew melon.

honeydew melon
 is so good I know I'm late
